Html:
Hello,

I need a VBA Code inside a Excel Sheet. How can I put some Code (VBA Functions) into a .xlsx File?

I allways try to define a .xlsx File with some Code inside and use this as template but it dosn't work.

How can I handle this?

I want to use this to fix some Problems in phpexel (Missing Functions).

Sample: Initinal for a Column-Filter over an autoexec macro.

 

Greetings

 

Frank

I'm sorry, you can't

Any features of Excel that PHPExcel cannot handle are discarded when a file is read, so they cannot be written to a new file. I have some ideas for handling VBA, but it's a major project in its own right.

If you can produce a list of the features/functions that you feel are missing from PHPExcel, we'll take a look at them individually. If they are standard features of Excel, they may be a lot easier to implement than VBA and macro handling.

Hello,
Is your project concerning VBA function import finished ?

Thanks for your answer
